document_data.mainbody:
'''''Night Thieves''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Laura Thompson]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the fifth part of the Shadow Games series.

{{Quote|''Intelligence en route to a secret Thayan base is passing through the embassy in Mulmaster. You have just two days to plan and execute a heist or lose your shot at the information forever.''{{Cite adventurers league/Night Thieves|1}}|}}
